metadata.feature_description: Generate and manage RSS feeds for published posts

steps.action: Navigate to the Publisher module on the News page
steps.expected: Publisher module is displayed with social sharing icons including RSS
steps.actual: Publisher module loaded successfully with RSS feed link visible among social sharing icons (Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, RSS)

steps.action: Click on the RSS feed icon to access the feed
steps.expected: RSS feed URL should open and display feed content
steps.actual: RSS feed link (/en-us/News/view/rss) was successfully accessed via the RSS icon

steps.action: Access the RSS feed URL directly
steps.expected: Valid RSS 2.0 XML content should be displayed
steps.actual: Valid RSS 2.0 XML was returned with proper XML declaration, RSS namespace, and channel structure

steps.action: Verify RSS feed contains expected elements
steps.expected: Feed should include channel info, items with title, link, description, pubDate, and author
steps.actual: Feed contained 12 items with complete metadata: title, link, author, description, pubDate, and categories (tags) where applicable. HTML content properly escaped in descriptions.

observations: RSS feed is enabled by default on the Publisher module (RssEnabled setting defaults to false in code but was enabled for this instance)
Feed respects the Publisher_RssMaxPosts portal setting (default 20 items)
Feed includes Atom namespace for compatibility (xmlns:a10)
Special characters in titles are properly XML-encoded (e.g., & becomes &)
HTML content in descriptions is properly escaped
Categories/tags are included as RSS category elements
Channel title and description appear empty - may be intentional or could be a minor issue depending on tab configuration
